title: What Caused Noah's Flood? - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/24/19
itunes:title: What Caused Noah's Flood? - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/24/19
description:
George Noory and researcher Freddy Silva explore his hypothesis that aliens sent an asteroid to wipe out evil giants that were destroying human civilization during Noah's time, and that stories of Greek gods may have actually been about the aliens.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

itunes:summary: An discussion of the theory that aliens caused Noah's flood to wipe out a race of evil giants.
